Cells were harvested including feeders and replated twice in an empty culture dish to starve the proT cells for Notch signaling. Cells were crosslinked in suspension. Lysed and sonicated in 0.25% SDS. Bio ChIP was performed with Streptavidin M280 beads.

requests.sample_comments: 18 B6 Rag2-/- Ly5.2 (10 female & 8 male, 7 weeks of age) were sacrificed by CO2 - thymi were dissected in proB medium and meshed - lymphocyte M purification was performed 2x. --> 125 x10^6 cells - DNaseI was performed by Markus (10U/ml; 30 U/ml; 50 U/ml) - cells were lysed over night - RNase treatment, 2x PCI purification, 1x CIAA, EtOH precip., resuspended in 50 µl 0.1x TE - 5 days later sucrose gradient (10% - 32.5%) was performed over night with all but 5 µl of the sample (~35 - 40 µg DNA) - 1st ml (Fraction 1) was removed and 250 µl fractions up to fraction 13 were taken from top to bottom, EtOH precipitated and resuspended in 50 µl 10 mM Tris pH 8.0 - fractions 3 - 8 were checked as 1/20 dilutions by qPCR - size fractionation was done with apoptotic ladder sample from Martina/Hiromi - conc of F6: 0.94 µg/µl; conc of F7: 1.0 µg/µl --> pool 10 µl of each fraction; AMpure size selction, KAPA amplification 8 cycles; re sequencing of 9870

1.sample_comments: 18 B6 Rag2-/- Ly5.2 (10 female & 8 male, 7 weeks of age) were sacrificed by CO2 - thymi were dissected in proB medium and meshed - lymphocyte M purification was performed 2x. --> 125 x10^6 cells - DNaseI was performed by Markus (10U/ml; 30 U/ml; 50 U/ml) - cells were lysed over night - RNase treatment, 2x PCI purification, 1x CIAA, EtOH precip., resuspended in 50 µl 0.1x TE - 5 days later sucrose gradient (10% - 32.5%) was performed over night with all but 5 µl of the sample (~35 - 40 µg DNA) - 1st ml (Fraction 1) was removed and 250 µl fractions up to fraction 13 were taken from top to bottom, EtOH precipitated and resuspended in 50 µl 10 mM Tris pH 8.0 - fractions 3 - 8 were checked as 1/20 dilutions by qPCR - size fractionation was done with apoptotic ladder sample from Martina/Hiromi - conc of F6: 0.94 µg/µl; conc of F7: 1.0 µg/µl --> pool 10 µl of each fraction; AMpure size selction, KAPA amplification 8 cycles; re sequencing of 9870

14271.comments: 18 B6 Rag2-/- Ly5.2 (10 female & 8 male, 7 weeks of age) were sacrificed by CO2 - thymi were dissected in proB medium and meshed - lymphocyte M purification was performed 2x. --> 125 x10^6 cells - DNaseI was performed by Markus (10U/ml; 30 U/ml; 50 U/ml) - cells were lysed over night - RNase treatment, 2x PCI purification, 1x CIAA, EtOH precip., resuspended in 50 µl 0.1x TE - 5 days later sucrose gradient (10% - 32.5%) was performed over night with all but 5 µl of the sample (~35 - 40 µg DNA) - 1st ml (Fraction 1) was removed and 250 µl fractions up to fraction 13 were taken from top to bottom, EtOH precipitated and resuspended in 50 µl 10 mM Tris pH 8.0 - fractions 3 - 8 were checked as 1/20 dilutions by qPCR - size fractionation was done with apoptotic ladder sample from Martina/Hiromi - conc of F6: 0.94 µg/µl; conc of F7: 1.0 µg/µl --> pool 10 µl of each fraction; AMpure size selction, KAPA amplification 8 cycles; re sequencing of 9870
